summary: REQ-1 is only partially evidenced: CubeVisualization.tsx shows an updated fragment shader main() with edge masking removed, but the diff does not demonstrate that the entire void main() block was replaced with the exact user-provided GLSL (including comments). Additionally, unrelated files (frontend-file-summaries.txt, project_state.json) were modified without being requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the entire BackgroundSphere fragment shader `void main()` block with the exact GLSL code provided by the user (including comments).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows a new `void main()` implementation, but the BuildRequest requires it to match user-provided GLSL exactly. The user-provided GLSL is not present in the diff summary, so exactness cannot be verified from the provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to update the fragment shader `void main()` in CubeVisualization.tsx; no request to update project metadata/state files.
BuildRequest does not mention updating any summary/documentation files; only the shader main() block update was requested.
